name: Jumanji
summary_text: When two kids find and play a magical board game, they release a man trapped in it for decades - and a host of dangers that can only be stopped by finishing the game.

name: Shooter
summary_text: A marksman living in exile is coaxed back into action after learning of a plot to kill the President. After being double crossed for the attempt and on the run, he sets out for the real killer and the truth.

name: Equilibrium
summary_text: In an oppressive future where all forms of feeling are illegal, a man in charge of enforcing the law rises to overthrow the system and state.

name: Burn After Reading
summary_text: A disk containing mysterious information from a CIA agent ends up in the hands of two unscrupulous and daft gym employees who attempt to sell it.

name: Jack Reacher
summary_text: A homicide investigator digs deeper into a case involving a trained military sniper who shot five random victims.

name: Constantine
summary_text: Supernatural exorcist and demonologist John Constantine helps a policewoman prove her sister's death was not a suicide, but something more.

name: Les Misérables
summary_text: In 19th-century France, Jean Valjean, who for decades has been hunted by the ruthless policeman Javert after breaking parole, agrees to care for a factory worker's daughter. The decision changes their lives forever.

name: About Time
summary_text: At the age of 21, Tim discovers he can travel in time and change what happens and has happened in his own life. His decision to make his world a better place by getting a girlfriend turns out not to be as easy as you might think.

name: The Simpsons Movie
summary_text: After Homer pollutes the town's water supply, Springfield is encased in a gigantic dome by the EPA and the Simpsons are declared fugitives.

name: Ford v Ferrari
summary_text: American car designer Carroll Shelby and driver Ken Miles battle corporate interference and the laws of physics to build a revolutionary race car for Ford in order to defeat Ferrari at the 24 Hours of Le Mans in 1966.

name: How to Train Your Dragon 2
summary_text: When Hiccup and Toothless discover an ice cave that is home to hundreds of new wild dragons and the mysterious Dragon Rider, the two friends find themselves at the center of a battle to protect the peace.

name: The Interview
summary_text: Dave Skylark and his producer Aaron Rapaport run the celebrity tabloid show "Skylark Tonight". When they land an interview with a surprise fan, North Korean dictator Jong-Un Kim, they are recruited by the CIA to assassinate him.

name: Click
summary_text: A workaholic architect finds a universal remote that allows him to fast-forward and rewind to different parts of his life. Complications arise when the remote starts to overrule his choices.

name: Hellboy
summary_text: A demon, raised from infancy after being conjured by and rescued from the Nazis, grows up to become a defender against the forces of darkness.

name: Eyes Wide Shut
summary_text: A New York City doctor embarks on a harrowing, night-long odyssey of sexual and moral discovery after his wife reveals a painful secret to him.

name: Hugo
summary_text: In 1931 Paris, an orphan living in the walls of a train station gets wrapped up in a mystery involving his late father and an automaton.

name: National Treasure
summary_text: A historian races to find the legendary Templar Treasure before a team of mercenaries.

name: Once Upon a Time in the West
summary_text: A mysterious stranger with a harmonica joins forces with a notorious desperado to protect a beautiful widow from a ruthless assassin working for the railroad.

name: Total Recall
summary_text: When a man goes in to have virtual vacation memories of the planet Mars implanted in his mind, an unexpected and harrowing series of events forces him to go to the planet for real - or is he?

name: 10 Things I Hate About You
summary_text: A pretty, popular teenager can't go out on a date until her ill-tempered older sister does.

name: The Mummy Returns
summary_text: The mummified body of Imhotep is shipped to a museum in London, where he once again wakes and begins his campaign of rage and terror.

name: The Nightmare Before Christmas
summary_text: Jack Skellington, king of Halloween Town, discovers Christmas Town, but his attempts to bring Christmas to his home causes confusion.

name: North by Northwest
summary_text: A New York City advertising executive goes on the run after being mistaken for a government agent by a group of foreign spies.

name: The Island
summary_text: A man living in a futuristic sterile colony begins to question his circumscribed existence when his friend is chosen to go to the Island, the last uncontaminated place on earth.

name: Lucky Number Slevin
summary_text: A case of mistaken identity lands Slevin into the middle of a war being plotted by two of the city's most rival crime bosses. Under constant surveillance by Detective Brikowski and assassin Goodkat, he must get them before they get him.

name: Real Steel
summary_text: In the near future, robot boxing is a top sport. A struggling ex-boxer feels he's found a champion in a discarded robot.

name: Top Gun
summary_text: As students at the United States Navy's elite fighter weapons school compete to be best in the class, one daring young pilot learns a few things from a civilian instructor that are not taught in the classroom.

name: Fifty Shades of Grey
summary_text: Literature student Anastasia Steele's life changes forever when she meets handsome, yet tormented, billionaire Christian Grey.

name: Solo: A Star Wars Story
summary_text: During an adventure into the criminal underworld, Han Solo meets his future co-pilot Chewbacca and encounters Lando Calrissian years before joining the Rebellion.

name: The Proposal
summary_text: A pushy boss forces her young assistant to marry her in order to keep her visa status in the U.S. and avoid deportation to Canada.

name: Transformers: Age of Extinction
summary_text: When humanity allies with a bounty hunter in pursuit of Optimus Prime, the Autobots turn to a mechanic and his family for help.

name: Chinatown
summary_text: A private detective hired to expose an adulterer finds himself caught up in a web of deceit, corruption, and murder.

name: My Neighbor Totoro
summary_text: When two girls move to the country to be near their ailing mother, they have adventures with the wondrous forest spirits who live nearby.

name: Jurassic Park III
summary_text: A decidedly odd couple with ulterior motives convince Dr. Grant to go to Isla Sorna for a holiday, but their unexpected landing startles the island's new inhabitants.

name: Hitch
summary_text: A smooth-talking man falls for a hardened columnist while helping a shy accountant woo a beautiful heiress.

name: Salt
summary_text: A CIA agent goes on the run after a defector accuses her of being a Russian spy.

name: Interview with the Vampire: The Vampire Chronicles
summary_text: A vampire tells his epic life story: love, betrayal, loneliness, and hunger.

name: The Blind Side
summary_text: The story of Michael Oher, a homeless and traumatized boy who became an All-American football player and first-round NFL draft pick with the help of a caring woman and her family.

name: Mission: Impossible - Fallout
summary_text: Ethan Hunt and his IMF team, along with some familiar allies, race against time after a mission gone wrong.

name: The Book of Eli
summary_text: A post-apocalyptic tale, in which a lone man fights his way across America in order to protect a sacred book that holds the secrets to saving humankind.

name: To Kill a Mockingbird
summary_text: Atticus Finch, a lawyer in the Depression-era South, defends a black man against an undeserved rape charge, and his children against prejudice.

name: Lord of War
summary_text: An arms dealer confronts the morality of his work as he is being chased by an INTERPOL Agent.

name: The Secret Life of Walter Mitty
summary_text: When both he and a colleague are about to lose their job, Walter takes action by embarking on an adventure more extraordinary than anything he could have ever imagined.

name: The Hangover Part III
summary_text: When one of their own is kidnapped by an angry gangster, the Wolf Pack must track down Mr. Chow, who has escaped from prison and is on the run.

name: Deja Vu
summary_text: After a ferry is bombed in New Orleans, an A.T.F. agent joins a unique investigation using experimental surveillance technology to find the bomber, but soon finds himself becoming obsessed with one of the victims.

name: Pretty Woman
summary_text: A man in a legal but hurtful business needs an escort for some social events, and hires a beautiful prostitute he meets... only to fall in love.

name: 10 Cloverfield Lane
summary_text: After getting in a car accident, a woman is held in a shelter by a man who claims that the outside world is affected by a widespread chemical attack.

name: Apocalypto
summary_text: As the Mayan kingdom faces its decline, a young man is taken on a perilous journey to a world ruled by fear and oppression.

name: The Expendables 2
summary_text: Mr. Church reunites the Expendables for what should be an easy paycheck, but when one of their men is murdered on the job, their quest for revenge puts them deep in enemy territory and up against an unexpected threat.

name: Gone with the Wind
summary_text: A manipulative woman and a roguish man conduct a turbulent romance during the American Civil War and Reconstruction periods.

name: There's Something About Mary
summary_text: A man gets a chance to meet up with his dream girl from high school, even though his date with her back then was a complete disaster.

name: A.I. Artificial Intelligence
summary_text: A highly advanced robotic boy longs to become "real" so that he can regain the love of his human mother.

name: Magnolia
summary_text: An epic mosaic of interrelated characters in search of love, forgiveness, and meaning in the San Fernando Valley.

name: RED
summary_text: When his peaceful life is threatened by a high-tech assassin, former black-ops agent Frank Moses reassembles his old team in a last-ditch effort to survive and uncover his assailants.

name: 3:10 to Yuma
summary_text: A small-time rancher agrees to hold a captured outlaw who's awaiting a train to go to court in Yuma. A battle of wills ensues as the outlaw tries to psych out the rancher.

name: The Hunger Games: Mockingjay - Part 2
summary_text: Katniss and a team of rebels from District 13 prepare for the final battle that will decide the fate of Panem.

name: Bridge of Spies
summary_text: During the Cold War, an American lawyer is recruited to defend an arrested Soviet spy in court, and then help the CIA facilitate an exchange of the spy for the Soviet captured American U2 spy plane pilot, Francis Gary Powers.

name: Taken 2
summary_text: In Istanbul, retired CIA operative Bryan Mills and his wife are taken hostage by the father of a kidnapper Mills killed while rescuing his daughter.

name: Babel
summary_text: Tragedy strikes a married couple on vacation in the Moroccan desert, touching off an interlocking story involving four different families.

name: O Brother, Where Art Thou?
summary_text: In the deep south during the 1930s, three escaped convicts search for hidden treasure while a relentless lawman pursues them.

name: The Wrestler
summary_text: A faded professional wrestler must retire, but finds his quest for a new life outside the ring a dispiriting struggle.

name: Scream
summary_text: A year after the murder of her mother, a teenage girl is terrorized by a new killer, who targets the girl and her friends by using horror films as part of a deadly game.

name: From Dusk Till Dawn
summary_text: Two criminals and their hostages unknowingly seek temporary refuge in a truck stop populated by vampires, with chaotic results.

name: The Hunt
summary_text: A teacher lives a lonely life, all the while struggling over his son's custody. His life slowly gets better as he finds love and receives good news from his son, but his new luck is about to be brutally shattered by an innocent little lie.

name: Neighbors
summary_text: After they are forced to live next to a fraternity house, a couple with a newborn baby do whatever they can to take them down.

name: Seven Pounds
summary_text: A man with a fateful secret embarks on an extraordinary journey of redemption by forever changing the lives of seven strangers.

name: Jumper
summary_text: A teenager with teleportation abilities suddenly finds himself in the middle of an ancient war between those like him and their sworn annihilators.

name: The Nice Guys
summary_text: In 1970s Los Angeles, a mismatched pair of private eyes investigate a missing girl and the mysterious death of a porn star.

name: The Bourne Legacy
summary_text: An expansion of the universe from Robert Ludlum's novels, centered on a new hero whose stakes have been triggered by the events of the previous three films.

name: The Transporter
summary_text: Frank Martin, who "transports" packages for unknown clients, is asked to move a package that soon begins moving, and complications arise.

name: Bird Box
summary_text: Five years after an ominous unseen presence drives most of society to suicide, a mother and her two children make a desperate bid to reach safety.

name: Contagion
summary_text: Healthcare professionals, government officials and everyday people find themselves in the midst of a pandemic as the CDC works to find a cure.

name: Kong: Skull Island
summary_text: After the Vietnam war, a team of scientists explores an uncharted island in the Pacific, venturing into the domain of the mighty Kong, and must fight to escape a primal Eden.

name: John Wick: Chapter 3 - Parabellum
summary_text: John Wick is on the run after killing a member of the international assassins' guild, and with a $14 million price tag on his head, he is the target of hit men and women everywhere.

name: Annihilation
summary_text: A biologist signs up for a dangerous, secret expedition into a mysterious zone where the laws of nature don't apply.

name: The Untouchables
summary_text: During the era of Prohibition in the United States, Federal Agent Eliot Ness sets out to stop ruthless Chicago gangster Al Capone and, because of rampant corruption, assembles a small, hand-picked team to help him.

name: Liar Liar
summary_text: A fast-track lawyer can't lie for 24 hours due to his son's birthday wish after he disappoints his son for the last time.

name: Serenity
summary_text: The crew of the ship Serenity try to evade an assassin sent to recapture telepath River.

name: Public Enemies
summary_text: The Feds try to take down notorious American gangsters John Dillinger, Baby Face Nelson and Pretty Boy Floyd during a booming crime wave in the 1930s.

name: Shrek the Third
summary_text: Reluctantly designated as the heir to the land of Far, Far Away, Shrek hatches a plan to install the rebellious Artie as the new king while Princess Fiona tries to fend off a coup d'état by the jilted Prince Charming.

name: Donnie Brasco
summary_text: An FBI undercover agent infiltrates the mob and finds himself identifying more with the mafia life, at the expense of his regular one.

name: Gattaca
summary_text: A genetically inferior man assumes the identity of a superior one in order to pursue his lifelong dream of space travel.

name: The Mist
summary_text: A freak storm unleashes a species of bloodthirsty creatures on a small town, where a small band of citizens hole up in a supermarket and fight for their lives.

name: 300: Rise of an Empire
summary_text: Greek general Themistokles of Athens leads the naval charge against invading Persian forces led by mortal-turned-god Xerxes and Artemisia, vengeful commander of the Persian navy.

name: The Dictator
summary_text: The heroic story of a dictator who risked his life to ensure that democracy would never come to the country he so lovingly oppressed.

name: Insidious
summary_text: A family looks to prevent evil spirits from trapping their comatose child in a realm called The Further.

name: Alien³
summary_text: After her last encounter, Ellen Ripley crash-lands on Fiorina 161, a maximum security prison. When a series of strange and deadly events occur shortly after her arrival, Ripley realizes that she has brought along an unwelcome visitor.

name: Moana
summary_text: In Ancient Polynesia, when a terrible curse incurred by the Demigod Maui reaches Moana's island, she answers the Ocean's call to seek out the Demigod to set things right.

name: Pitch Perfect
summary_text: Beca, a freshman at Barden University, is cajoled into joining The Bellas, her school's all-girls singing group. Injecting some much needed energy into their repertoire, The Bellas take on their male rivals in a campus competition.

name: The Man from U.N.C.L.E.
summary_text: In the early 1960s, CIA agent Napoleon Solo and KGB operative Illya Kuryakin participate in a joint mission against a mysterious criminal organization, which is working to proliferate nuclear weapons.

name: Notting Hill
summary_text: The life of a simple bookshop owner changes when he meets the most famous film star in the world.

name: Ace Ventura: Pet Detective
summary_text: A goofy detective specializing in animals goes in search of the missing mascot of the Miami Dolphins.

name: Moonlight
summary_text: A young African-American man grapples with his identity and sexuality while experiencing the everyday struggles of childhood, adolescence, and burgeoning adulthood.

name: Kingsman: The Golden Circle
summary_text: After the Kingsman's headquarters are destroyed and the world is held hostage, an allied spy organisation in the United States is discovered. These two elite secret organisations must band together to defeat a common enemy.

name: Con Air
summary_text: Newly paroled ex-con and former U.S. Ranger Cameron Poe finds himself trapped in a prisoner transport plane when the passengers seize control.

name: Beauty and the Beast
summary_text: A selfish Prince is cursed to become a monster for the rest of his life, unless he learns to fall in love with a beautiful young woman he keeps prisoner.

name: As Good as It Gets
summary_text: A single mother and waitress, a misanthropic author, and a gay artist form an unlikely friendship after the artist is assaulted in a robbery.

name: Insomnia
summary_text: Two Los Angeles homicide detectives are dispatched to a northern town where the sun doesn't set to investigate the methodical murder of a local teen.

name: Before Sunrise
summary_text: A young man and woman meet on a train in Europe, and wind up spending one evening together in Vienna. Unfortunately, both know that this will probably be their only night together.

name: Batman Returns
summary_text: While Batman deals with a deformed man calling himself the Penguin wreaking havoc across Gotham with the help of a cruel businessman, a female employee of the latter becomes the Catwoman with her own vendetta.

name: Angels & Demons
summary_text: Harvard symbologist Robert Langdon works with a nuclear physicist to solve a murder and prevent a terrorist act against the Vatican during one of the significant events within the church.

name: Zack Snyder's Justice League
summary_text: Determined to ensure Superman's ultimate sacrifice was not in vain, Bruce Wayne aligns forces with Diana Prince with plans to recruit a team of metahumans to protect the world from an approaching threat of catastrophic proportions.

name: Zero Dark Thirty
summary_text: A chronicle of the decade-long hunt for al-Qaeda terrorist leader Osama bin Laden after the September 2001 attacks, and his death at the hands of the Navy S.E.A.L.s Team 6 in May 2011.

name: Snow White and the Huntsman
summary_text: In a twist to the fairy tale, the Huntsman ordered to take Snow White into the woods to be killed winds up becoming her protector and mentor in a quest to vanquish the Evil Queen.

name: Law Abiding Citizen
summary_text: A frustrated man decides to take justice into his own hands after a plea bargain sets one of his family's killers free.

name: School of Rock
summary_text: After being kicked out of his rock band, Dewey Finn becomes a substitute teacher of an uptight elementary private school, only to try and turn his class into a rock band.

name: Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time
summary_text: A young fugitive prince and princess must stop a villain who unknowingly threatens to destroy the world with a special dagger that enables the magic sand inside to reverse time.

name: Apollo 13
summary_text: NASA must devise a strategy to return Apollo 13 to Earth safely after the spacecraft undergoes massive internal damage putting the lives of the three astronauts on board in jeopardy.

name: Superman Returns
summary_text: Superman returns to Earth after spending five years in space examining his homeworld Krypton. But he finds things have changed while he was gone, and he must once again prove himself important to the world.

name: Starship Troopers
summary_text: Humans in a fascist, militaristic future wage war with giant alien bugs.

name: Bridesmaids
summary_text: Competition between the maid of honor and a bridesmaid, over who is the bride's best friend, threatens to upend the life of an out-of-work pastry chef.

name: Clash of the Titans
summary_text: Perseus, demigod, son of Zeus, battles the minions of the underworld to stop them from conquering heaven and earth.

name: Death Proof
summary_text: Two separate sets of voluptuous women are stalked at different times by a scarred stuntman who uses his "death proof" cars to execute his murderous plans.

name: Jurassic World: Fallen Kingdom
summary_text: When the island's dormant volcano begins roaring to life, Owen and Claire mount a campaign to rescue the remaining dinosaurs from this extinction-level event.

name: Lawrence of Arabia
summary_text: The story of T.E. Lawrence, the English officer who successfully united and led the diverse, often warring, Arab tribes during World War I in order to fight the Turks.

name: Shazam!
summary_text: A newly fostered young boy in search of his mother instead finds unexpected super powers and soon gains a powerful enemy.

name: The Fugitive
summary_text: Dr. Richard Kimble, unjustly accused of murdering his wife, must find the real killer while being the target of a nationwide manhunt led by a seasoned U.S. Marshal.

name: Step Brothers
summary_text: Two aimless middle-aged losers still living at home are forced against their will to become roommates when their parents marry.

name: The Royal Tenenbaums
summary_text: The eccentric members of a dysfunctional family reluctantly gather under the same roof for various reasons.

name: Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Men Tell No Tales
summary_text: Captain Jack Sparrow is pursued by old rival Captain Salazar and a crew of deadly ghosts who have escaped from the Devil's Triangle. They're determined to kill every pirate at sea...notably Jack.

name: Kingdom of Heaven
summary_text: Balian of Ibelin travels to Jerusalem during the Crusades of the 12th century, and there he finds himself as the defender of the city and its people.

name: A Bug's Life
summary_text: A misfit ant, looking for "warriors" to save his colony from greedy grasshoppers, recruits a group of bugs that turn out to be an inept circus troupe.

name: Lone Survivor
summary_text: Marcus Luttrell and his team set out on a mission to capture or kill notorious Taliban leader Ahmad Shah, in late June 2005. Marcus and his team are left to fight for their lives in one of the most valiant efforts of modern warfare.

name: Green Lantern
summary_text: Reckless test pilot Hal Jordan is granted an alien ring that bestows him with otherworldly powers that inducts him into an intergalactic police force, the Green Lantern Corps.

name: Scent of a Woman
summary_text: A prep school student needing money agrees to "babysit" a blind man, but the job is not at all what he anticipated.

name: Moulin Rouge!
summary_text: A poet falls for a beautiful courtesan whom a jealous duke covets.

name: The Twilight Saga: New Moon
summary_text: Edward leaves Bella after an attack that nearly claimed her life, and, in her depression, she falls into yet another difficult relationship - this time with her close friend, Jacob Black.

name: Forgetting Sarah Marshall
summary_text: Devastated Peter takes a Hawaiian vacation in order to deal with the recent break-up with his TV star girlfriend, Sarah. Little does he know, Sarah's traveling to the same resort as her ex - and she's bringing along her new boyfriend.

name: Beetlejuice
summary_text: The spirits of a deceased couple are harassed by an unbearable family that has moved into their home, and hire a malicious spirit to drive them out.

name: Fast & Furious
summary_text: Brian O'Conner, back working for the FBI in Los Angeles, teams up with Dominic Toretto to bring down a heroin importer by infiltrating his operation.

name: The Accountant
summary_text: As a math savant uncooks the books for a new client, the Treasury Department closes in on his activities, and the body count starts to rise.

name: Pride & Prejudice
summary_text: Sparks fly when spirited Elizabeth Bennet meets single, rich, and proud Mr. Darcy. But Mr. Darcy reluctantly finds himself falling in love with a woman beneath his class. Can each overcome their own pride and prejudice?

name: Gone in 60 Seconds
summary_text: A retired master car thief must come back to the industry and steal fifty cars with his crew in one night to save his brother's life.

name: The World's End
summary_text: Five friends who reunite in an attempt to top their epic pub crawl from twenty years earlier unwittingly become humanity's only hope for survival.

name: Panic Room
summary_text: A divorced woman and her diabetic daughter take refuge in their newly-purchased house's safe room, when three men break-in, searching for a missing fortune.

name: Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas
summary_text: An oddball journalist and his psychopathic lawyer travel to Las Vegas for a series of psychedelic escapades.

name: Terminator Genisys
summary_text: When John Connor, leader of the human resistance, sends Sgt. Kyle Reese back to 1984 to protect Sarah Connor and safeguard the future, an unexpected turn of events creates a fractured timeline.

name: The Jungle Book
summary_text: After a threat from the tiger Shere Khan forces him to flee the jungle, a man-cub named Mowgli embarks on a journey of self discovery with the help of panther Bagheera and free-spirited bear Baloo.

name: Mulan
summary_text: To save her father from death in the army, a young maiden secretly goes in his place and becomes one of China's greatest heroines in the process.

name: 28 Weeks Later
summary_text: Six months after the rage virus was inflicted on the population of Great Britain, the US Army helps to secure a small area of London for the survivors to repopulate and start again. But not everything goes according to plan.

name: Olympus Has Fallen
summary_text: Secret Service agent Mike Banning finds himself trapped inside the White House in the wake of a terrorist attack and works with national security to rescue the President from his kidnappers.

name: Ice Age: The Meltdown
summary_text: Manny, Sid, and Diego discover that the ice age is coming to an end, and join everybody for a journey to higher ground. On the trip, they discover that Manny, in fact, is not the last of the woolly mammoths.

name: The Gentlemen
summary_text: An American expat tries to sell off his highly profitable marijuana empire in London, triggering plots, schemes, bribery and blackmail in an attempt to steal his domain out from under him.

name: Hachi: A Dog's Tale
summary_text: A college professor bonds with an abandoned dog he takes into his home.

name: Alien: Covenant
summary_text: The crew of a colony ship, bound for a remote planet, discover an uncharted paradise with a threat beyond their imagination, and must attempt a harrowing escape.

name: Hannibal
summary_text: Living in exile, Dr. Hannibal Lecter tries to reconnect with now disgraced F.B.I. Agent Clarice Starling, and finds himself a target for revenge from a powerful victim.

name: Stardust
summary_text: In a countryside town bordering on a magical land, a young man makes a promise to his beloved that he'll retrieve a fallen star by venturing into the magical realm.

name: Kung Fu Panda 2
summary_text: Po and his friends fight to stop a peacock villain from conquering China with a deadly new weapon, but first the Dragon Warrior must come to terms with his past.

name: Contact
summary_text: Dr. Ellie Arroway, after years of searching, finds conclusive radio proof of extraterrestrial intelligence, sending plans for a mysterious machine.

name: Hellboy II: The Golden Army
summary_text: A prince of the mythical world starts a rebellion against humanity in order to rule the Earth, and Hellboy his team must fight to stop him from locating the all-powerful Golden Army.

name: Predestination
summary_text: For his final assignment, a top temporal agent must pursue the one criminal that has eluded him throughout time. The chase turns into a unique, surprising and mind-bending exploration of love, fate, identity and time travel taboos.
A man who specialises in debunking paranormal occurrences checks into the fabled room 1408 in the Dolphin Hotel. Soon after settling in, he confronts genuine terror.

name: Marriage Story
summary_text: Noah Baumbach's incisive and compassionate look at a marriage breaking up and a family staying together.

name: Kick-Ass 2
summary_text: Following Kick-Ass' heroics, other citizens are inspired to become masked crusaders. But Red Mist leads his own group of evil supervillains to get revenge, kill Kick-Ass and destroy everything he stands for.

name: John Carter
summary_text: Transported to Barsoom, a Civil War vet discovers a barren planet seemingly inhabited by 12-foot tall barbarians. Finding himself prisoner of these creatures, he escapes, only to encounter Woola and a princess in desperate need of a savior.

name: The Patriot
summary_text: Peaceful farmer Benjamin Martin is driven to lead the Colonial Militia during the American Revolution when a sadistic British officer murders his son.

name: Incredibles 2
summary_text: The Incredibles family takes on a new mission which involves a change in family roles: Bob Parr (Mr. Incredible) must manage the house while his wife Helen (Elastigirl) goes out to save the world.

name: Dredd
summary_text: In a violent, futuristic city where the police have the authority to act as judge, jury and executioner, a cop teams with a trainee to take down a gang that deals the reality-altering drug, SLO-MO.

name: Red Dragon
summary_text: A retired FBI agent with psychological gifts is assigned to help track down "The Tooth Fairy", a mysterious serial killer. Aiding him is imprisoned forensic psychiatrist Dr. Hannibal "The Cannibal" Lecter.

name: Almost Famous
summary_text: A high-school boy is given the chance to write a story for Rolling Stone Magazine about an up-and-coming rock band as he accompanies them on their concert tour.

name: The Graduate
summary_text: A disillusioned college graduate finds himself torn between his older lover and her daughter.

name: Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon
summary_text: A young Chinese warrior steals a sword from a famed swordsman and then escapes into a world of romantic adventure with a mysterious man in the frontier of the nation.

name: Atonement
summary_text: Thirteen-year-old fledgling writer Briony Tallis irrevocably changes the course of several lives when she accuses her older sister's lover of a crime he did not commit.

name: Robin Hood
summary_text: In twelfth-century England, Robin Longstride and his band of marauders confront corruption in a local village and lead an uprising against the crown that will forever alter the balance of world power.

name: Meet the Fockers
summary_text: All hell breaks loose when the Byrnes family meets the Focker family for the first time.

name: Underworld
summary_text: Selene, a vampire warrior, is entrenched in a conflict between vampires and werewolves, while falling in love with Michael, a human who is sought by werewolves for unknown reasons.

name: The Holiday
summary_text: Two women troubled with guy-problems swap homes in each other's countries, where they each meet a local guy and fall in love.

name: Now You See Me 2
summary_text: The Four Horsemen resurface, and are forcibly recruited by a tech genius to pull off their most impossible heist yet.

name: 2 Fast 2 Furious
summary_text: Former cop Brian O'Conner is called upon to bust a dangerous criminal and he recruits the help of a former childhood friend and street racer who has a chance to redeem himself.

name: Annie Hall
summary_text: Alvy Singer, a divorced Jewish comedian, reflects on his relationship with ex-lover Annie Hall, an aspiring nightclub singer, which ended abruptly just like his previous marriages.

name: Hulk
summary_text: Bruce Banner, a genetics researcher with a tragic past, suffers an accident that causes him to transform into a raging green monster when he gets angry.

name: Gone Baby Gone
summary_text: Two Boston area detectives investigate a little girl's kidnapping, which ultimately turns into a crisis both professionally and personally.

name: 8 Mile
summary_text: A young rapper, struggling with every aspect of his life, wants to make it big but his friends and foes make this odyssey of rap harder than it may seem.

name: Phone Booth
summary_text: Publicist Stuart Shepard finds himself trapped in a phone booth, pinned down by an extortionist's sniper rifle. Unable to leave or receive outside help, Stuart's negotiation with the caller leads to a jaw-dropping climax.

name: Fantastic Four: Rise of the Silver Surfer
summary_text: The Fantastic Four learn that they aren't the only super-powered beings in the universe when they square off against the powerful Silver Surfer and the planet-eating Galactus.

name: Manchester by the Sea
summary_text: A depressed uncle is asked to take care of his teenage nephew after the boy's father dies.

name: Non-Stop
summary_text: An air marshal springs into action during a transatlantic flight after receiving a series of text messages demanding $150 million into an off-shore account, or someone will die every 20 minutes.

name: Vanilla Sky
summary_text: A self-indulgent and vain publishing magnate finds his privileged life upended after a vehicular accident with a resentful lover.

name: Unknown
summary_text: When a man awakens from a coma only to discover that someone has taken on his identity, he teams up with a young woman to prove who he is.

name: Creed
summary_text: The former World Heavyweight Champion Rocky Balboa serves as a trainer and mentor to Adonis Johnson, the son of his late friend and former rival Apollo Creed.

name: Resident Evil
summary_text: A special military unit fights a powerful, out-of-control supercomputer and hundreds of scientists who have mutated into flesh-eating creatures after a laboratory accident.

name: Dark Shadows
summary_text: An imprisoned vampire, Barnabas Collins, is set free and returns to his ancestral home, where his dysfunctional descendants are in need of his protection.

name: The Place Beyond the Pines
summary_text: A motorcycle stunt rider turns to robbing banks as a way to provide for his lover and their newborn child, a decision that puts him on a collision course with an ambitious rookie cop navigating a department ruled by a corrupt detective.

name: Hereditary
summary_text: A grieving family is haunted by tragic and disturbing occurrences.

name: Road to Perdition
summary_text: A mob enforcer's son witnesses a murder, forcing him and his father to take to the road, and his father down a path of redemption and revenge.

name: Mrs. Doubtfire
summary_text: After a bitter divorce, an actor disguises himself as a female housekeeper to spend time with his children held in custody by his former wife.

name: Lady Bird
summary_text: In 2002, an artistically inclined seventeen-year-old girl comes of age in Sacramento, California.

name: Blade
summary_text: A half-vampire, half-mortal man becomes a protector of the mortal race, while slaying evil vampires.

name: Zoolander
summary_text: At the end of his career, a clueless fashion model is brainwashed to kill the Prime Minister of Malaysia.

name: Corpse Bride
summary_text: When a shy groom practices his wedding vows in the inadvertent presence of a deceased young woman, she rises from the grave assuming he has married her.

name: The Goonies
summary_text: A group of young misfits called The Goonies discover an ancient map and set out on an adventure to find a legendary pirate's long-lost treasure.

name: The A-Team
summary_text: A group of Iraq War veterans look to clear their name with the U.S. Military, who suspect the four men of committing a crime for which they were framed.

name: Lincoln
summary_text: As the American Civil War continues to rage, America's president struggles with continuing carnage on the battlefield as he fights with many inside his own cabinet on the decision to emancipate the slaves.

name: Van Helsing
summary_text: The famed monster hunter is sent to Transylvania to stop Count Dracula, who is using Dr. Frankenstein's research and a werewolf for nefarious purposes.

name: Some Like It Hot
summary_text: After two male musicians witness a mob hit, they flee the state in an all-female band disguised as women, but further complications set in.

name: The Fast and the Furious: Tokyo Drift
summary_text: A teenager becomes a major competitor in the world of drift racing after moving in with his father in Tokyo to avoid a jail sentence in America.

name: Enemy at the Gates
summary_text: A Russian and a German sniper play a game of cat-and-mouse during the Battle of Stalingrad.

name: The Adjustment Bureau
summary_text: The affair between a politician and a contemporary dancer is affected by mysterious forces keeping the lovers apart.

name: Grease
summary_text: Good girl Sandy Olsson and greaser Danny Zuko fell in love over the summer. When they unexpectedly discover they're now in the same high school, will they be able to rekindle their romance?

name: Jerry Maguire
summary_text: When a sports agent has a moral epiphany and is fired for expressing it, he decides to put his new philosophy to the test as an independent agent with the only athlete who stays with him and his former colleague.

name: The Other Guys
summary_text: Two mismatched New York City detectives seize an opportunity to step up like the city's top cops, whom they idolize, only things don't quite go as planned.

name: The Greatest Showman
summary_text: Celebrates the birth of show business and tells of a visionary who rose from nothing to create a spectacle that became a worldwide sensation.

name: Finding Dory
summary_text: Friendly but forgetful blue tang Dory begins a search for her long-lost parents, and everyone learns a few things about the real meaning of family along the way.

name: The Village
summary_text: A series of events tests the beliefs of a small isolated countryside village.

name: Office Space
summary_text: Three company workers who hate their jobs decide to rebel against their greedy boss.

name: Noah
summary_text: Noah is chosen by God to undertake a momentous mission before an apocalyptic flood cleanses the world.

name: The Sting
summary_text: Two grifters team up to pull off the ultimate con.

name: Vicky Cristina Barcelona
summary_text: Two friends on a summer holiday in Spain become enamored with the same painter, unaware that his ex-wife, with whom he has a tempestuous relationship, is about to re-enter the picture.

name: Nocturnal Animals
summary_text: A wealthy art gallery owner is haunted by her ex-husband's novel, a violent thriller she interprets as a symbolic revenge tale.

name: Dances with Wolves
summary_text: Lieutenant John Dunbar, assigned to a remote western Civil War outpost, befriends wolves and Indians, making him an intolerable aberration in the military.

name: Warcraft
summary_text: As an Orc horde invades the planet Azeroth using a magic portal, a few human heroes and dissenting Orcs must attempt to stop the true evil behind this war.

name: Seven Psychopaths
summary_text: A struggling screenwriter inadvertently becomes entangled in the Los Angeles criminal underworld after his oddball friends kidnap a gangster's beloved Shih Tzu.

name: Bad Boys
summary_text: Two hip detectives protect a witness to a murder while investigating a case of stolen heroin from the evidence storage room from their police precinct.

name: Sully
summary_text: The story of Chesley "Sully" Sullenberger (Tom Hanks), an American pilot who became a hero after landing his damaged plane on the Hudson River in order to save the flight's passengers and crew.

name: Blow
summary_text: The story of how George Jung, along with the Medellín Cartel headed by Pablo Escobar, established the American cocaine market in the 1970s in the United States.

name: Boogie Nights
summary_text: Back when sex was safe, pleasure was a business and business was booming, an idealistic porn producer aspires to elevate his craft to an art when he discovers a hot young talent.

name: The Grey
summary_text: After their plane crashes in Alaska, six oil workers are led by a skilled huntsman to survival, but a pack of merciless wolves haunts their every step.

name: Rush Hour
summary_text: A loyal and dedicated Hong Kong Inspector teams up with a reckless and loudmouthed L.A.P.D. detective to rescue the Chinese Consul's kidnapped daughter, while trying to arrest a dangerous crime lord along the way.

name: American Pie 2
summary_text: Jim and his friends are now in college, and they decide to meet up at the beach house for some fun.

name: Total Recall
summary_text: A factory worker, Douglas Quaid, begins to suspect that he is a spy after visiting Rekall - a company that provides its clients with implanted fake memories of a life they would like to have led - goes wrong and he finds himself on the run.

name: Grave of the Fireflies
summary_text: A young boy and his little sister struggle to survive in Japan during World War II.

name: Changeling
summary_text: Grief-stricken mother Christine Collins (Angelina Jolie) takes on the L.A.P.D. to her own detriment when it tries to pass off an obvious impostor as her missing child.

name: Chronicle
summary_text: Three high school friends gain superpowers after making an incredible discovery underground. Soon they find their lives spinning out of control and their bond tested as they embrace their darker sides.

name: GoldenEye
summary_text: Years after a friend and fellow 00 agent is killed on a joint mission, a secret space based weapons program known as "GoldenEye" is stolen. James Bond sets out to stop a Russian crime syndicate from using the weapon.

name: The Little Mermaid
summary_text: A mermaid princess makes a Faustian bargain in an attempt to become human and win a prince's love.

name: Rango
summary_text: Rango is an ordinary chameleon who accidentally winds up in the town of Dirt, a lawless outpost in the Wild West in desperate need of a new sheriff.

name: True Lies
summary_text: A fearless, globe-trotting, terrorist-battling secret agent has his life turned upside down when he discovers his wife might be having an affair with a used-car salesman while terrorists smuggle nuclear war heads into the United States.

name: Before Sunset
summary_text: Nine years after Jesse and Celine first met, they encounter each other again on the French leg of Jesse's book tour.

name: Lethal Weapon
summary_text: Two newly paired cops who are complete opposites must put aside their differences in order to catch a gang of drug smugglers.

name: A Few Good Men
summary_text: Military lawyer Lieutenant Daniel Kaffee defends Marines accused of murder. They contend they were acting under orders.

name: Dog Day Afternoon
summary_text: Three amateur bank robbers plan to hold up a bank. A nice simple robbery: Walk in, take the money, and run. Unfortunately, the supposedly uncomplicated heist suddenly becomes a bizarre nightmare as everything that could go wrong does.

name: Us
summary_text: A family's serene beach vacation turns to chaos when their doppelgängers appear and begin to terrorize them.

name: RocknRolla
summary_text: When a Russian mobster orchestrates a crooked land deal, millions of dollars are up for grabs, drawing in the entire London underworld into a feeding frenzy at a time when the old criminal regime is losing turf to a wealthy foreign mob.

name: Battleship
summary_text: A fleet of ships is forced to do battle with an armada of unknown origins in order to discover and thwart their destructive goals.

name: Hook
summary_text: When Captain James Hook kidnaps his children, an adult Peter Pan must return to Neverland and reclaim his youthful spirit in order to challenge his old enemy.

name: Paul
summary_text: Two English comic book geeks traveling across the U.S. encounter an alien outside Area 51.

name: Dawn of the Dead
summary_text: A nurse, a policeman, a young married couple, a salesman and other survivors of a worldwide plague that is producing aggressive, flesh-eating zombies, take refuge in a mega Midwestern shopping mall.

name: Batman Forever
summary_text: Batman must battle former district attorney Harvey Dent, who is now Two-Face and Edward Nygma, The Riddler with help from an amorous psychologist and a young circus acrobat who becomes his sidekick, Robin.

name: Perfume: The Story of a Murderer
summary_text: Jean-Baptiste Grenouille, born with a superior olfactory sense, creates the world's finest perfume. His work, however, takes a dark turn as he searches for the ultimate scent.

name: Walk the Line
summary_text: A chronicle of country music legend Johnny Cash's life, from his early days on an Arkansas cotton farm to his rise to fame with Sun Records in Memphis, where he recorded alongside Elvis Presley, Jerry Lee Lewis, and Carl Perkins.

name: Batman & Robin
summary_text: Batman and Robin try to keep their relationship together even as they must stop Mr. Freeze and Poison Ivy from freezing Gotham City.

name: RoboCop
summary_text: In a dystopic and crime-ridden Detroit, a terminally wounded cop returns to the force as a powerful cyborg haunted by submerged memories.

name: Crank
summary_text: Professional assassin Chev Chelios learns his rival has injected him with a poison that will kill him if his heart rate drops.

name: For a Few Dollars More
summary_text: Two bounty hunters with the same intentions team up to track down a Western outlaw.

name: Sunshine
summary_text: A team of international astronauts are sent on a dangerous mission to reignite the dying Sun with a nuclear fission bomb in 2057.

name: Halloween
summary_text: Fifteen years after murdering his sister on Halloween night 1963, Michael Myers escapes from a mental hospital and returns to the small town of Haddonfield, Illinois to kill again.

name: The Blair Witch Project
summary_text: Three film students vanish after traveling into a Maryland forest to film a documentary on the local Blair Witch legend, leaving only their footage behind.

name: Cinema Paradiso
summary_text: A filmmaker recalls his childhood when falling in love with the pictures at the cinema of his home village and forms a deep friendship with the cinema's projectionist.

name: Alita: Battle Angel
summary_text: A deactivated cyborg's revived, but can't remember anything of her past and goes on a quest to find out who she is.

name: Saw II
summary_text: A detective and his team must rescue 8 people trapped in a factory by the twisted serial killer known as Jigsaw.
